# `DeanonymizeOptions`

## Parameters

---

**<span className="parameter-name">locale</span>** <span className="optional-status">optional</span> `string`

Locale of the user, in two digits

---

**<span className="parameter-name">allowedRoles</span>** <span className="optional-status">optional</span> `Array<string>`

Allowed roles of the user. Must be a subset of the default allowed roles defined in Hasura Auth.

---

**<span className="parameter-name">defaultRole</span>** <span className="optional-status">optional</span> `string`

Default role of the user. Must be part of the default allowed roles defined in Hasura Auth.

---

**<span className="parameter-name">displayName</span>** <span className="optional-status">optional</span> `string`

Display name of the user. If not provided, it will use the display name given by the social provider (Oauth) used on registration, or the email address otherwise.

---

**<span className="parameter-name">metadata</span>** <span className="optional-status">optional</span> `Record<string, unknown>`

Custom additional user information stored in the `metadata` column. Can be any JSON object.

---

**<span className="parameter-name">email</span>** <span className="optional-status">optional</span> `string`

---

**<span className="parameter-name">password</span>** <span className="optional-status">optional</span> `string`

---
